content.prompt: What was the primary intention of the Adams administration in enforcing the Sedition Act?

choices.label: To intimidate critics of Adamsâ€™ foreign policy toward France and England
To prosecute Democratic-Republicans who violated American neutrality
To prepare for war against Great Britain
To keep France from selling Louisiana to Spain
